name: Last Slice (GDoggPDX)
description:
Last Slice is a game about a boy who is very hungry, but then pizza starts falling from the sky! Unfortunately, there are some evil and hungry zombies, that want some pizza(and of course brains) to! Use the arrow keys to jump over them to get the most pizza you can and get the highest score! 

This game has had a massive update as now the game is fully improved! The new update includes music, backgrounds, and a tutorial!
